titles.title: Uniform Wireless Consumer Protection Act
A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to establish a uniform set of customer service and consumer protection requirements for providers of wireless telecommunications services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 10/16/2007--Introduced. Uniform Wireless Consumer Protection Act - Prohibits, notwithstanding any other provision of law (under current law, notwithstanding specified provisions), a state or local government from regulating or adjudicating the entry of or the rates charged by any provider of commercial mobile service or private mobile service.
